name: Afraid of the Night
description:
Afraid of the Night - Is a psychological single-player horror game set in a deserted town filled with horrific creatures and nightmarish delusions.

You play a young man desperately searching for answers in the cold night, finding his way through his nightmares as he slowly sinks into madness. With an emphasis on cinematic experience, immersion and lateral thinking, players will be taken on a nightmarish roller coaster ride through the grim streets of Cambrai and beyond. Not everything is as it seems...

"Beware though, it's not for the faint of heart."

"Where Am I? What kind of nightmare is this..."

    KEY FEATURES:

  • Huge single-player campaign with over 8 hours of gameplay
  • Multiple endings and over 10 different unlockables to keep you playing
  • Terrifying and unforgettable atmosphere
  • Unlockable extra campaign after beating single-player
  • Original soundtrack comprises over 5 hours of haunting, melodic music
